ValidationRule.description: This rule limits who can update the Opportunity Paperwork Status field in Salesforce.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( Opportunity_Paperwork_Status__c) = TRUE, NOT(OR( $UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Account Resources', $UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Account Resources Supervisor', $UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Account Service Manager')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please contact the Account Resources Department for any updates to the Opportunity Paperwork Status field.
